summary: An internal FBI email chain from June 22, 2020, discussing scheduling a meeting to receive an update on the Ghislaine Maxwell case from the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The email references coordination with the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge).

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Mentioned as someone from whom the latest information will be heard during a scheduled meeting about the Maxwell case.

events.title: Email coordination for Maxwell case update
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to schedule a meeting for the following day to receive the latest information on the Ghislaine Maxwell case from SDNY.

keyFacts: The email is dated June 22, 2020, indicating ongoing FBI activity related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case at that time.
The communication is internal among FBI personnel, discussing coordination with the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
A meeting was being scheduled for June 23, 2020, at 2:30 PM to receive an update, indicating active case management.
The email references the involvement of the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge), suggesting high-level oversight.
The subject 'C20 Update' likely refers to a case or project designation related to the Maxwell investigation.
